channel.title: S.E.X. - IVO (E/E's Scandalous Mix) [Heavy Future Bass, Remix, Explicit]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/eslashe/ivo-sex-eslashe-scandalous-mix
Happy Valentine's Day today ladies and gentlemen. Please, use protection.
Original song by @xavior. You can find the original song [here](https://soundcloud.com/official_ivo/sex). The moaning was sampled from sample tracks online, and none were taken from any explicit content. [spoiler]I'm not _that_ tasteless ;3[/spoiler]
I had a fun time remixing this song, it was rather difficult as the original files were lost. I still had the vox to work with, so I took that and ran with it. I think it worked well in the way I took the song. To add to the atmosphere more, I sampled some stock moaning in order to build up the nature of this track. It's a fun track, and I wanted to emphasize that more with this remix.
Today, or any day rather, if you are feeling alone, stay strong. One day you will find the one you are meant to be with. Remember, there's always a brighter side. If you need help, please do not be afraid to reach out.
https://disco.auxy.co/t/the-lighter-side-charity-campaign/2781
![%20remix%20(1)|500x500](upload://7ln2zwpD5e100LSyyrPIufJoJuS.jpg)

Happy Valentine’s Day today ladies and gentlemen. Please, use protection.

Original song by @xavior. You can find the original song here. The moaning was sampled from sample tracks online, and none were taken from any explicit content. spoiler

I had a fun time remixing this song, it was rather difficult as the original files were lost. I still had the vox to work with, so I took that and ran with it. I think it worked well in the way I took the song. To add to the atmosphere more, I sampled some stock moaning in order to build up the nature of this track.
